panels.description: Overall cluster status: HEALTY or DEGRADED
panels.title: Status

panels.description: Calculated Total cluster available space based on current Reduction Ratio
panels.title: Estimated Available

panels.description: Total Raw cluster capacity
panels.title: Cluster Capacity

panels.description: Total Raw used cluster capacity
panels.title: Used Capacity

panels.description: Calculated current data redaction ratio
panels.title: Data Reduction Ratio

panels.description: In case of SSD offload (hybrid deployment) it displays its current average utilization across all the nodes in the cluster
panels.title: MD Offload Utilization

panels.description: Total cluster current utilization
panels.title: Utilization

panels.description: Total number of all objects in the cluster including S3 parts
panels.title: Objects in the Cluster

panels.description: Total number of all the object versions in the cluster
panels.title: Versions in the Cluster

panels.description: Average client I/O 4K normalized latency across all the gateways in the cluster, including mixed and dedicated. For example, 32K transfer would be counted as latency of 8 by 4K blocks.
panels.title: Client I/O 4K Normalized Latency

panels.description: Aggregated total and average client I/O IOPS across all the gateways in the cluster, including mixed and dedicated.
panels.title: Client IOPS

panels.description: Aggregated total and average client I/O throughput across all the gateways in the cluster, including mixed and dedicated.
panels.title: Client Throughput

panels.description: Aggregation of activity across top 100 tenants
panels.title: Top Tenants

panels.description: Aggregation of activity across top 100 buckets
panels.title: Top Buckets (Read/Write)

panels.description: Aggregation of activity across top 100 objects
panels.title: Top Objects (Read/Write)

panels.description: Aggregation of activity across top 100 services
panels.title: Top Services

panels.description: Aggregated S3 throughput across all the gateways in the cluster, including mixed and dedicated.
panels.title: Top S3 Throughput

panels.description: Aggregated NFS throughput across all the gateways in the cluster, including mixed and dedicated.
panels.title: Top NFS Throughput

panels.description: Aggregated iSCSI throughput across all the gateways in the cluster, including mixed and dedicated.
panels.title: Top iSCSI Throughput

panels.description: Aggregated SWIFT throughput across all the gateways in the cluster, including mixed and dedicated.
panels.title: Top SWIFT Throughput

panels.description: Aggregated NBD throughput across all the gateways in the cluster, including mixed and dedicated.
panels.title: Top NBD Throughput

panels.description: Aggregated internal I/O, or custom libccow throughput across all the gateways in the cluster, including mixed and dedicated.
panels.title: Top Custom Throughput

panels.description:
Reported states:
 
   1    - service fully available
   0    - service partially available (likely networking issue)
  -1    - service unavailable (df command isn't working)
  -2    - service unavailable (showmount command isn't working)
  -3    - service unavailable (not mounted)
panels.title: NFS Services Status

yaxes.label: S T A T E S

panels.description:
Reported states:
 
   1	- service fully available
   0	- service LUNs not found
  -1	- service not discoverable (likely networking issue)
panels.title: iSCSI Services Status

yaxes.label: S T A T E S

panels.description:
Reported states:
 
   1	- service fully available
   0	- service bucket HEAD failed
  -1	- service object HEAD failed
  -2	- service not discoverable (likely networking issue)
panels.title: S3 Services Status

yaxes.label: S T A T E S

panels.description: VDEVS currently in online and available state
panels.title: ONLINE

panels.title: DEGRADED

panels.title: Total IOPS

panels.description: Average read latency across all VDEVs in the cluster, 4K normalized
panels.title: Avg. Read Latency

panels.description: Average read latency across all VDEVs in the cluster, 4K normalized
panels.title: Avg. Write Latency

panels.description: Total read throughput across all VDEVs in the cluster
panels.title: Total Read Throughput

panels.description: Total write throughput across all VDEVs in the cluster
panels.title: Total Write Throughput

panels.description: Bandwidth utilization for all the VDEVs per averaged per node
panels.title: IOSTAT Disk Utilization Avg

panels.description: Average VDEVs IOPS per node
panels.title: IOSTAT Disk IOPS Avg

panels.description: 90th quantile of VDEVs IO size per node
panels.title: IOSTAT Disk Size Avg

panels.description: Aggregation of important error counters per VDEV
panels.title: S.M.A.R.T Errors

panels.description: Reports Current Temperature of all VDEVs in the cluster
panels.title: S.M.A.R.T Current Temperature

panels.description: Checks Health Status for all the VDEVs in the cluster. Reports FAIL if at least one has a problem.
panels.title: S.M.A.R.T. Status

panels.description: Checks Health Status for all the VDEVs in the cluster. Reports FAIL if at least one has a problem.
panels.title: Attention VDEV

panels.title: BG GC

panels.description: Space Reclaim approximate progress across cluster
panels.title: BG Space Reclaim

panels.title: Transaction Log
